hero.title: Modern and Premium Flats for Rent in Sector 65 Gurugram
description: Sector 65 Gurugram is a fast-growing and premium residential locality located along Golf Course Extension Road, known for its modern infrastructure and lifestyle-oriented development. Tenants searching for a flat for rent in Sector 65 Gurugram prefer this area because of its excellent connectivity to Sohna Road, Southern Peripheral Road, and major business hubs of Gurugram. The locality offers a well-planned urban environment with easy access to malls, offices, schools, and healthcare facilities.

Flats for rent in Sector 65 Gurugram are available in contemporary high-rise societies and premium builder floors that focus on spacious layouts, modern amenities, and secure living. The area attracts professionals, families, and expatriates looking for a refined lifestyle with comfort and convenience. With strong rental demand, high-quality residential projects, and future growth potential, Sector 65 stands out as a preferred destination for long-term and upscale rental living in Gurugram.

faqSection.title: Frequently Asked Questions About Flats for Rent in Sector 65 Gurugram
faqSection.description: Clear and detailed answers to help tenants make informed rental decisions.

faqs.question: Is Sector 65 Gurugram a good area for renting a flat?
faqs.answer: Yes, Sector 65 is a premium and fast-developing locality offering modern residential projects, strong connectivity, and lifestyle amenities.

faqs.question: What types of flats are available for rent in Sector 65?
faqs.answer: Tenants can find high-rise society apartments and builder floor flats in furnished, semi-furnished, and unfurnished options.

faqs.question: Is Sector 65 suitable for families?
faqs.answer: Yes, the sector is family-friendly with schools, hospitals, parks, and shopping destinations nearby.

faqs.question: How is connectivity from Sector 65 Gurugram?
faqs.answer: Sector 65 enjoys excellent connectivity via Golf Course Extension Road, Sohna Road, and Southern Peripheral Road.

faqs.question: Are rental flats in Sector 65 expensive?
faqs.answer: Sector 65 is considered a premium locality, and rental prices reflect the quality of projects and amenities offered.

faqs.question: Are furnished flats available in Sector 65?
faqs.answer: Yes, many furnished and semi-furnished flats are available depending on the society and landlord preference.

faqs.question: Is parking available with rental flats?
faqs.answer: Most residential societies and builder floors provide dedicated or covered parking facilities.

faqs.question: Do working professionals prefer Sector 65?
faqs.answer: Yes, professionals prefer Sector 65 due to proximity to corporate hubs and modern lifestyle infrastructure.

faqs.question: Does Deal Acres provide verified rental listings?
faqs.answer: Yes, all listings on Deal Acres are verified to ensure authenticity and tenant trust.

faqs.question: How can I find a flat for rent in Sector 65 Gurugram?
faqs.answer: You can submit the enquiry form to receive personalized assistance from experienced rental property consultants.
